# External List

This is a list of the external software included.

## CLI11 

[CLI11](https://github.com/CLIUtils/CLI11)  
[CLI11 Book](https://cliutils.github.io/CLI11/book/)  

## C++ logging

[Easylogging++](https://github.com/amrayn/easyloggingpp)   
[Plog](https://github.com/SergiusTheBest/plog)  

## Hash Test

[Hash Test Smasher](https://github.com/rurban/smhasher)  

## CRC
[CRC](https://github.com/d-bahr/CRCpp)   
[CRC32/CRC64](https://github.com/maandree/util-linux/blob/master/include/crc64.h)  

## Hash Programs
[mx3](https://github.com/jonmaiga/mx3/)
[xxhash](https://create.stephan-brumme.com/xxhash/)   
[wyhash](https://github.com/wangyi-fudan/wyhash)
